name: Aesthetic Arena
description: Ａｅｓｔｈｅｔｉｃ　Ａｒｅｎａ, is a wave based shooter where the objective is to survive in a trippy atmosphere.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: Intel Core i3 CPU Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: 3D graphics card compatible with DirectX DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 1 GB available space Sound Card: Any DirectX Compatible Sound Card
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 10 Processor: Intel Core i5 CPU Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA Geforce 920M DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 2 GB available space Sound Card: Any DirectX Compatible Sound Card
